description: "An early 17th century map by the Flemish/Dutch cartographer Jodocus Hondius showing Asia and part of Europe and Africa. The Latin text on New Guinea translates as ‘Whether it is an island or the southern part of the continent is not yet certain’."
label: "L'Asia nuouamente corretta et accresciuta, secondo le relationi piu moderme da / Gvclielmo Sansone Geografo di S.M. Christma ; Giorgio  Widman sculp."
